website_summaries.verdict: While on the expensive side, buyers rave over the quality, taste, and color of this organic avocado oil.
pros: Cold pressed, extra virgin, and unrefined
Good for cooking as well as skin and hair applications
cons: Some feel this oil tastes stale
Some say the bottle is a little small for the price

customer_reviews.title: product is good, but glass or aluminium powder may get into the oil
customer_reviews.text: The avocado oil itself is good, but the cap(made from Aluminium) grinds with the glass bottle when turning, and glass or aluminium powder comes off and it can get into the avocado oil. There is no such problem with similar bottle for olive oil.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I researched many avo oils. This product is usda organic, non gmo, extra virgin, cold pressed, unrefined, produced and bottled in CA. I use it in a MIX for facial oils ( if you put too much it will smell of avocado and take awhile to absorb (heavy as a stand-alone facial oil) but a fantastic and gentle moisturizer in a mix.
customer_reviews.author: Bea

customer_reviews.title: Healthy option.
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, i'm very happy with this product. Put a few drops of avocado oil on your filet mignon rub the avocado oil all over it, put your rub I use weber Chicago steak & steak chop let it sit for 15-20 mins , warm the pan on the cooktop with 2 -3 tps of avocado oil and start cooking, after they are done put a slice of grass fed kerri gold butter on top, and wallaaa best damn steak you will ever taste. ill post photos.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: This is wonderful! Expensive, but definitely worth it. Wonderful for cooking, it is clean and light. I'm very generous with it when I cook, and the flavor is so mild that it compliments anything. I feel healthier just using it! I'm definitely a repeat customer!
customer_reviews.author: pamela caeley morrison

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I fried with it but was disappointed as the temperature was not that high and I felt like the oil was burning. Was hoping for better heat tolerance as suggested by an olive oil farmer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... and this by far has been one of the best ones!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried a lot of brands of avocado oil and this by far has been one of the best ones !! I Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Snafees

customer_reviews.title: This is by far the best tasting Avacado oil
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tasting Avacado oil I have tried and I have tried many. Will be re-ordering this brand for sure. Smooth, great tasting, great in color.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice and green
customer_reviews.text: Nice and green, not processed. The only thing missing from pressing it myself is the wonderful avocado smell. All in all good product.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Ihlefeld

customer_reviews.title: avacado cooking oil
customer_reviews.text: has rancid smell and did not heat to degree stated it would - on medium heat, top of stove, it splattered - avocado oil is not supposed to react in this manner :/
customer_reviews.author: kb

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I really try to buy only organic products for my family and this is a great avocado oil that is also organic! Not many avocado oils are. I like that it comes in glass bottles and the flavor is very much like extra virgin olive oil. Very rich flavor! It is a little pricey so i don't use it on all my cooking but i do love it and so does my family!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Blalock

customer_reviews.title: Smooth!
customer_reviews.text: I’m not a fan of olive oil was looking for a alternative and found AVOHASS! and I am in Love! Taste smooth and tastes great on everything!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Our favorite oil. Excellent quality, great taste, great color, cooks everything beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: jk

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality oil
customer_reviews.text: I've used avocado oil for several years. My local option for organic extra virgin is no longer available so I tried this one because the reviews were very positive but I found the oil to be of very poor quality. I question whether it is actually avocado oil as it tastes bitter and chemically. Sadly this product is not eligible for a return.
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Can't Get Any Better Than This!
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Avohass Organic Extra Virgin Avocado Oil on a sautéed spinach, kale, and garlic combination last night, and it was perfect. Incidentally, I read this week, that when avocado oil is added to greens, it quadruples their nutritional values. So I certainly will continue buying Avohass because it has all of the nutrients I look for.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Go-to oil for cooking
customer_reviews.text: I use avocado oil and coconut oil for cooking. This Avohass organic avocado oil is actually delicious when used in a dressing but it does not have an over-strong flavor when used in cooking. It is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: BLC

customer_reviews.title: So far I like it. It's got a light but earthy flavor
customer_reviews.text: So far I like it. It's got a light but earthy flavor. Not sure how to describe it but obviously different than olive oil, which is what I am used to. I would love it if the company would tell me what the exact (or close to it) smoke point is and if I can use it to make popcorn. (I know I can drizzle it on top!) SO healthy for me. Thanks for the great discount, Amazon. :)
customer_reviews.author: JJ47

customer_reviews.title: Happy I found this company
customer_reviews.text: Finding organic avocado oil is harder than you think! Happy I found this company, great tasting, quality organic oil. I bought 2, one for my skin & one for cooking. Quick shipping & processing too!
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Favorite avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: I use this for extra moisturizer on our 3c 4a textured hair. It absolutely works as a daily refresher (mixed in a mister with water). We are in love with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanette Flores

customer_reviews.title: Impressive product and vendor
customer_reviews.text: We are very happy with this avocado oil which we use in cooking. We had an issue which the vendor promptly resolved. Very impressed. Will continue to purchase
customer_reviews.author: J.C. & Linda

customer_reviews.title: It’s very good quality and food taste fresh when I fried egg ...
customer_reviews.text: It’s very good quality and food taste fresh when I fried egg rolls.just wish it was a little cheaper for such a small bottle
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to try avocado oil. It is pretty heavy I tried it in a salad dressing too heavy for me but good for stir fry
customer_reviews.author: therapist

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Like a green gem, this oil is perfect for cooking or drizzling. Lovely taste and mouth feel.
customer_reviews.author: JPC10

customer_reviews.title: We loved this product
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product. There are not a lot of organic options available. Unfortunately the price increased 33% from our first order only 6 weeks prior to my intent to order more today. It's forcing me to search for another option. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome flavor
customer_reviews.text: Excellent oil. Will buy again. Just wish it came in bigger sizes. I would buy gallons of this oil
customer_reviews.author: Kim H.

customer_reviews.title: I really like the quality.
customer_reviews.text: I was going to purchase another bottle of this oil but the price is $9. More than it was a month ago.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the flavor.
customer_reviews.text: Great flavor - easy to cook with at all temps. Quick ship as well.
customer_reviews.author: DG1125

customer_reviews.title: Great flavor!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best Avocado oil butttttt, way too expensive for such a small (8oz) bottle! Pls, do your research.
customer_reviews.author: Craft

customer_reviews.title: Light good taste and good value
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasant and light taste, good value, and of course very healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: Nice and rich, light flavor, not heavy, dark golden color, I used it on roasted veggies, great flavor.
customer_reviews.author: cookenup

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this avacodo oil . Will definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: Good addition to the other oils I use on salads and on my skin and it's organic.
customer_reviews.author: Geoffrey Campbell

customer_reviews.title: A great product and I'll buy again
customer_reviews.text: This is a very versatile product you can sprinkle right out of the bottle on your salad or cook with it. The taste is light and not overpowering. The company was great to work with and my order arrived promptly and in perfect order.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Ross

customer_reviews.title: Good scent and taste!
customer_reviews.text: I am satisfied with this avocado oil as it produces far less smoke than other oils while cooking.
customer_reviews.author: swlee

customer_reviews.title: Best avocado oil
customer_reviews.text: Purest , best for the health , tastiest avocado oil there is!! I haven't found anything like it n I've searched so so so much
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love this oil it's unique, so smooth and not greasy tasting
customer_reviews.author: DianeM.

customer_reviews.title: Healthiest Oil.
customer_reviews.text: Great product, very pricey for an 8 ounce of avocado oil.
customer_reviews.author: music_sweetness

customer_reviews.title: Organic Avocado Oil
customer_reviews.text: Best quality Organic Avocado oil! Delicious, with rich color and texture....will definitely purchase this product again!
customer_reviews.author: cecile Poletti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent in taste and color.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent both in taste and color. Withstands reasonable temperatures when using to cook skillet items. Does not seem to degrade or discolor items cooked.
customer_reviews.author: Muzel701

customer_reviews.title: Shut up and give them your money.
customer_reviews.text: I'm hooked. I don't use any other oil to cook with. The garlic, lime and regular are my go-to.
customer_reviews.author: james shahan

customer_reviews.title: This oil is wonderful. I have been using it for everything
customer_reviews.text: This oil is wonderful. I have been using it for everything. Tonight I cooked my chicken breast in the oil . What a great flavor . Will Bebe ordering often.
customer_reviews.author: lizzie

customer_reviews.title: it is great - smooth
customer_reviews.text: For me, it is great - smooth, rather on the thick side and extremely tasty.....
customer_reviews.author: Robert T.

customer_reviews.title: Love That It's Organic
customer_reviews.text: Great oil to use and it's organic. A win win situation!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent avocado oil. I use it in skincare and it's so smooth and luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Sparkle242

customer_reviews.title: Great USA Product!
customer_reviews.text: Great USA product! Beautiful, emerald green oil! Packaged very well. Will buy more!
customer_reviews.author: rangergirl10

customer_reviews.title: Good quality & reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent avocado oil product at a reasonable price! Used to be from New Zealand, currently from Kenya, but, quality is consistently good.
customer_reviews.author: R.H.

customer_reviews.title: Light Avacado taste and light green color
customer_reviews.text: Has a light green color and tastes faintly of Avacado. It hits all the right targets for a healthy made oil. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: Just by looking at its richness you know your doing something good for your body!
customer_reviews.text: It tastes great and the color is so rich! I have been using it for everything... cooking, salad dressing, on my avocados etc! Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it, and love that is in a dark glass container!
customer_reviews.author: Warrior

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great taste. Fast service. Free shipping. Love that is bottled in California
customer_reviews.author: Michael P. Mullen

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: By far best tasting organic avocado oil I have ever used. Will continue to buy this product .
customer_reviews.author: happy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE IT, LOVE IT, LOVE IT! A little expensive BUT the flavor is EXCEPTIONAL!!
customer_reviews.author: Christine M

customer_reviews.title: I really like the taste - it tastes better than olive oil ...
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste - it tastes better than olive oil and I was told it's healthier too. I use it as a salad dressing and will use it to fry g=veggies, etc. I will definitely keep using it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Kastner

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great mild taste. A very healthy oil to start using.
customer_reviews.author: June C. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Kenya Product - no returns
customer_reviews.text: The Organic oil is from Kenya. It's hard enough to trust US organics. I cannot trust Kenya for organic food. I don't know what their regulations are, who is doing the checking and how often etc to confirm true standards. I'm hesitant to trust the US standards especially on large organic operations. If you are good with buying organic food from Kenya then this is a good price as there is another shop on amazon selling one bottle for $25. Like the other reviewers stated no returns !!!
customer_reviews.author: CP

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Tasted stale to me. Maybe that is how avocado oil tastes?
customer_reviews.author: OnLineShopper

customer_reviews.title: Not California grown. Kenya. Eat local.
customer_reviews.text: Darnit. USDA Certified Organic, etc. But a product of Kenya. Bottled in California. I believe country of origin should be honestly disclosed in description. Seller contacted me and was quite rude. Also, no returns. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Tom2903

customer_reviews.title: Leaked all over.
customer_reviews.text: The package was leaking oil all over itself, my door, my rug and I'm sure over all other packages in the truck. So if you get an oily delivery and you live nearby, you can be reasonably certain this product leaked over your package too.
customer_reviews.author: PenName

customer_reviews.title: Natural ! Avocado oil from California
customer_reviews.text: We love the idea that this oil is pure Avocado'sn grown in California, and the oil is cold pressed, unrefined. Will continue to buy every couple months.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: High quality
customer_reviews.text: Pricey for a small bottle but well worth it. I personally just feel better using this oil. Doesn’t have a strong avocado taste it’s actually quite neutral. Great for sautés, making eggs.. it’s just good stuff!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Gonzalez

product_meta.title: Avohass California USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin Avocado Oil Made in USA 8.5 fl oz Bottle
product_meta.description: Size:8.5 Fl Oz (Pack of 1)Avohass California USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin Avocado Oil 8.5 oz Bottle. Produced and Bottled in California.
feature_bullets: USDA ORGANIC CERTIFIED, USDA CALIFORNIA CERTIFIED AVOCADOS, EXTRA VIRGIN, FIRST COLD PRESSED, UNREFINED: Avohass USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin Avocado Oil is made premium Grade A California USDA Organic Certified avocados, perfectly ripe and cold pressed for high quality rich flavor. Avohass is vibrant green in color with a slightly nutty, rich, buttery avocado flavor. Avohass is USDA Organic Certified.

MINIMAL PROCESSING: Avohass USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin quality avocado oil implies that only premium, unbruised, perfectly ripe USDA Organic Certified fruit can be used. No heat, no chemicals and no solvents used, producing a raw, living avocado oil loaded with vitamins and minerals producing nutrient dense oil. Extra Virgin is always “Unrefined” and “First Cold Pressed”.

NON GMO PROJECT VERIFIED: Avohass USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin Avocado Oil is Non GMO and more, Keto approved, Paleo & Whole30 compliant and naturally gluten free, dairy free, cholesterol free, soy free, sugar free, and packed with heart healthy high monounsaturated fats.

HIGH SMOKE POINT: Avohass USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin Avocado Oil 400F smoke point makes it ideal for all your high heat cooking like sautéing, stir-fry, and roasting and is also rich in flavor, which makes the perfect vinaigrette, salad dressings, dips, sauces and marinades. ”From Drizzle To Sizzle”

VERSATILITY: Avohass USDA Organic Certified Extra Virgin Avocado Oil is not only great in the kitchen but also a wonderful addition to your skin and hair care needs. Extra Virgin Avocado Oil has a natural sunscreen 8-15 SPF, packed with Vitamin E, Lutein, Omegas and Sterols for skin & hair repair, and has a super high absorption rate for optimal hair & skin moisturization.
